snippet: Michaels Stores Inc, the biggest U.S. arts and crafts retailer, on Thursday confirmed that there was a security breach at certain systems that process payment cards at its U.S. stores and that of its unit, Aaron Brothers....

headline.print_headline: Retailer Michaels Stores Confirms Payment Card Data Breach
headline.main: Retailer Michaels Stores Confirms Payment Card Data Breach

lead_paragraph: Michaels Stores Inc, the biggest U.S. arts and crafts retailer, on Thursday confirmed that there was a security breach at certain systems that process payment cards at its U.S. stores and that of its unit, Aaron Brothers.
